document_api_meta.title: Get Price Detail
document_api_meta.env_desc: Get the detailed pricing calculation information of an order or a line item, including vouchers, tax, etc.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^currency
response_param.desc: Currency Type. Three-letter code, see [ISO 4217](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html).

response_param.name: ^total
response_param.desc: Total number of the original price of the order. Calculation: `sku_list_price` + `shipping_list_price`

response_param.name: ^payment
response_param.desc: Payment of the order from the buyer. Calculation: `sku_sale_price` + `shipping_sale_price` + `tax_amount` + `small_order_fee`

response_param.name: ^sku_list_price
response_param.desc: Total MSRP price of the products.

response_param.name: ^sku_sale_price
response_param.desc: Total promotional sale price of the products. Calculation: `sku_list_price` - `subtotal_deduction_seller` - `subtotal_deduction_platform`

response_param.name: ^subtotal
response_param.desc: Total promotional sale price of the products including tax. Calculation: `sku_sale_price` + `subtotal_tax_amount`

response_param.name: ^subtotal_deduction_seller
response_param.desc: Seller provided price discount on the product

response_param.name: ^subtotal_deduction_platform
response_param.desc: Platform provided price discount on the product

response_param.name: ^subtotal_tax_amount
response_param.desc: Total tax amount on the product

response_param.name: ^voucher_deduction_platform
response_param.desc:
Type of the platform-providing discount on the product. Possible values:
`1010000`: PLATFORM_NEW_USER,
`1020000`: SELLER_SKU_PRICE`,
`1030000`: PLATFORM_FREE_SHIPPING

response_param.name: ^voucher_deduction_seller
response_param.desc:
Type of the seller-providing discount on the product. Possible values:
`1010000`: PLATFORM_NEW_USER,
`1020000`: SELLER_SKU_PRICE,
`1030000`: PLATFORM_FREE_SHIPPING`

response_param.name: ^shipping_list_price
response_param.desc: Original shipping price

response_param.name: ^shipping_sale_price
response_param.desc: Promotional shipping price Calculation: shipping_list_price - shipping_fee_deduction -shipping_fee_deduction_platform

response_param.name: ^shipping_fee_deduction_seller
response_param.desc: Shipping discount covered by the seller.

response_param.name: ^shipping_fee_deduction_platform
response_param.desc: Shipping discount covered by the platform

response_param.name: ^shipping_fee_deduction_platform_voucher
response_param.desc:
Shipping discount covered by the platform voucher: 
`1010000`: PLATFORM_NEW_USER,
`1020000`: SELLER_SKU_PRICE
`1030000`: PLATFORM_FREE_SHIPPING

response_param.name: ^tax_amount
response_param.desc: Total tax amount. Calculation: subtotal_tax_amount + shipping_fee_tax（in TaxDetail） + cod_fee_tax（TaxDetail）

response_param.name: ^tax_rate
response_param.desc: Tax rate

response_param.name: ^net_price_amount
response_param.desc: Price after tax

response_param.name: ^cod_fee
response_param.desc: COD fee charged by shipping aggregators. For regions outside of Saudi Arabia, the value is `0.00`.

response_param.name: ^cod_fee_net_amount
response_param.desc: COD fee charged by shipping aggregators including tax. For regions outside of Saudi Arabia, the value is `0.00`.

response_param.name: ^sku_gift_original_price
response_param.desc: Original sku list price of the gift product from the seller.

response_param.name: ^sku_gift_net_price
response_param.desc: Original sku list price of the gift product from the seller including tax.

response_param.name: ^line_items
response_param.desc: Each object is the same as the "data" field (line 5) without "line_items"

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: corresponding line_item id

response_param.name: ^^currency
response_param.desc: Currency Type. Three-letter code, see [ISO 4217](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html).

error_code_list.msg: Invalid parameters. Please ensure you are passing the correct request parameter(s).
The order or package does not belong to the current seller.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to have access to all of seller's order data in real-time via API.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to have access to all of your order data in real-time via API. The Partner will be able to obtain your order status and order details for data reconciliation.
